title: How many selection lists are issued by St. Xavier's College, Ranchi for a B.Com Hons.? - Quora

response.answer_text: Generally ,st Xavier college issues 2 list . And in the both list u find 2 sub divided group … 1st is morning batch for those student who get higher marks in the entrance as compare to other students who appeared for entrance exam test. And 2nd is evening batch for the students who got marks less than the morning batch student….. And then admission process start …and it's take 5 to 6 days… then 2nd list is issued by college…it is also same as 1st list. Some time college also issue 3rd list.. but it's all depend upon the number of students appeared for admission. Thankyou Best of luck
Bcom has highest no of students so many student's gets admission in bcom no of seats are very high…
